summary: Combined job portal and business directory application. Employers, employees, and businesses must receive admin approval before their listings are published. Users register with paid subscriptions via Stripe and receive unique IDs after approval. Business directory allows approved businesses to list with photos and contact details. Uses Internet Identity for authentication.
architectural_notes: Uses Internet Identity for secure authentication (passkey-based)
Stripe integration for processing registration fees
Unique ID generation system for employers and employees
Photo upload capability for business directory listings
Dual-purpose platform: job portal + business directory
Admin approval workflow required before listings go live

existing_features.title: Create admin dashboard page at /admin route that displays all pending employees, employers, and businesses awaiting approval with approve/reject action buttons for each.
Update JobsPage to only display jobs from approved employers, filtering out pending and rejected employer listings.
Update BusinessDirectoryPage to only display approved businesses, filtering out pending and rejected business listings.
Add approval status indicator to ProfilePage showing current status (pending, approved, rejected) for user's employee, employer, or business registrations with informative messaging.
Add Header navigation link to admin dashboard visible only to admin users.

new_feature_requests.summary: Employer registration with payment and unique ID generation
Employee registration with payment and unique ID generation
Business directory with photo uploads and business details
Stripe payment gateway integration for registration fees
Admin approval system for employer, employee, and business listings
Add backend data model for admin approval status with three states: pending, approved, rejected. Include approval timestamp and optional rejection reason fields.
Modify employee registration backend to set initial approval status as pending and store all registration data including name, contact, experience, skills, and education.
Modify employer registration backend to set initial approval status as pending and store all registration data including company name, industry, size, website, description, and contact details.
Modify business listing backend to set initial approval status as pending and store all business data including name, category, description, contact info, and location.
Create backend admin functions to approve or reject employees, employers, and businesses. Include ability to set rejection reason when rejecting.
Implement backend admin authorization check to verify only designated admin principals can execute approval/rejection functions.
